content.en: Steel scheduling: Researchers have been exploring how algorithms can optimize the scheduling process in steelmaking and continuous casting. They have developed various models and approaches, such as mix optimization scheduling, Lagrangian relaxation, and metaheuristic methods, to improve production planning and scheduling. These algorithms take into account factors like machine capacity, electricity price, and uncertain processing time to achieve more efficient and effective scheduling in the steelmaking-continuous casting process.
content.da: Stålplanlægning: Forskere har undersøgt, hvordan algoritmer kan optimere planlægningsprocessen i stålproduktion og kontinuerlig støbning. De har udviklet forskellige modeller og tilgange, såsom mix-optimeringsplanlægning, Lagrange-relaksation og metaheuristiske metoder, for at forbedre produktionsplanlægning og tidsplanlægning. Disse algoritmer tager hensyn til faktorer som maskinkapacitet, elpris og usikker behandlingstid for at opnå mere effektiv og virkningsfuld planlægning i stålproduktion-kontinuerlig støbningsprocessen.
